Disc 2 1978-1985:
Rock Goes To College Middlesex Polytechnic 7 December 1978
01 - Shin Kicker
02 - Mississippi Sheiks
03 - Do You Read Me
04 - Brute Force And Ignorance
05 - Fuel To The Fire
06 - Shadow Play
07 - Cruise On Out
Scene Around Six BBC Northern Ireland 5 January 1984
08 - Interview
BBC Northern Ireland Rory At Midnight 5 January 1984
09 - Double Vision
10 - Follow Me
11 - I Wonder Who
12 - Big Guns
13 - Out On The Western Plain
14 - Shadow Play
Old Grey Whistle Test 26th February 1985
15 - Interview
16 - Can't Be Satisfied

About: Universal Music will release Rory Gallagher The BBC Collection in October, a 20-disc set (18 CDs & 2 blu-rays) described as “the definitive collection of Rory Gallagher’s recorded performances at the BBC”. The Irish guitarist and songwriter was one of the most recorded musicians of the 1970s by the BBC and this new box was created from tapes in the Beeb’s archives along with Rory Gallagher’s own transcription discs and off-air cassette recordings. Over three quarters of the audio recordings are previously unreleased. The BBC Collection takes in 16 years of Gallagher’s career (1971-1986) and highlights include the 1977 television and radio broadcast ‘Sight & Sound’ concert, Rory’s headlining set at the Reading Festival in 1980 and the ‘At Midnight’ concert live from the Ulster Hall in Belfast, 1984. The blu-rays offer BBC TV concerts and studio performances from 1973 to 1984.
